BackstoryDef.title: ancient engineer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a team attempting to reverse-engineer ancient ARC components. The mysteries behind the machineâ€™s intricate designs fascinated [PAWN_objective]. Although much of the technology was incomprehensible, [PAWN_pronoun] successfully adapted a few critical parts for modern use.

BackstoryDef.title: power architect
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in optimizing the power flow within ARC systems. By carefully calibrating the fuel rods, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to significantly extend the reactor's operational time. Despite lacking full knowledge of the ancient mechanisms, [PAWN_nameDef]'s adjustments became the industry standard.

BackstoryDef.title: control systems engineer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with modernizing the control systems of ARC reactors. While [PAWN_pronoun] integrated new safety protocols, many of the core functions remained a black box. Even so, [PAWN_pronoun] managed to boost efficiency by adapting the ancient algorithms.

BackstoryDef.title: field repair tech
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years repairing damaged ARC units in remote colonies. Despite lacking the original schematics, [PAWN_pronoun] became adept at improvising fixes. It was a dangerous job, but [PAWN_pronoun] always carried a few spare ARC components, just in case.

BackstoryDef.title: ARC safety inspector
BackstoryDef.description: As a safety inspector, [PAWN_nameDef] traveled between colonies, checking the status of ARC reactors. Although [PAWN_pronoun] could only speculate about how the core systems worked, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to identify potential failures and suggest maintenance that extended reactor lifespans.
